page.title: 16LIFE STYLE.
page.content: In the village there are several strata in which life styles differ considerably. Styles are based on the background, education, and financial status of the residents. A few residents live in London where they are in business and spend their weekends in the village. The majority of the older residents live in a simple practical way. Those who have worked on the land always had their lifestyle determined by low wages and hard labour. They have a realistic view of the limits of country life. New residents often have a romantic ideal of country life but they tend to still live as they would in town. The young are building new life styles often based on ideas gleaned from magazines and television. None of these groups have much in common.
